mapper.select: SELECT pre.* FROM partition_result_edge pre, partition_result pr WHERE pr.id = pre.patition_result_a_id AND pr.partition_id = #{partitionId}

SELECT ci.id callId, ci.callee calleeId, ci.caller callerId, ci.count callCount, p1.patition_result_id patitionResultAId, p2.patition_result_id patitionResultBId FROM dynamic_call_info ci LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pd.node_id, pd.patition_result_id FROM partition_detail pd, partition_result pr WHERE pd.patition_result_id = pr.id AND pr.partition_id = #{partitionId} ) p1 ON p1.node_id = ci.caller LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pd.node_id, pd.patition_result_id FROM partition_detail pd, partition_result pr WHERE pd.patition_result_id = pr.id AND pr.partition_id = #{partitionId} ) p2 ON p2.node_id = ci.callee WHERE ci.dynamic_analysis_info_id = #{pairRelationInfoId}
